entries.title: Apple's Black History Month plans may tip an earlier than expected iOS 16.3 launch
entries.description: In addition to the new Apple Watch strap, the company hints at the release date for iOS 16.3.

entries.title: Git patches two critical remote code execution security flaws
entries.description: The flaws would allow threat actors to run arbitrary code remotely.

entries.title: Your Wi-Fi router could spy exactly where you are in a room
entries.description: Signal from Wi-Fi router can be used as a sort of sonar feeding into an AI-powered image processing software.

entries.title: Ransomware attack hits maritime giant DNV
entries.description: Company software used by dozens of firms and hundreds of ships forced offline following a ransomware attack.

entries.title: Nvidia GeForce Now Ultimate can give you RTX 4080 performance on a Chromebook
entries.description: Nvidia GeForce Now Ultimate membership tier gets you top gaming RTX 4080 PC performance for much cheaper than buying the actual graphics card.

entries.title: Rumor says another Apple TV 4K upgrade is coming; we say 'why?'
entries.description: Report claims Cupertino company is readying a new version of its streaming box with a boosted CPU

entries.title: I listened to music on the HomePod 2 and was totally blown away
entries.description: Based on our first listen, Apple just raised the bar for smart speaker audio with the HomePod 2

entries.title: The US State Department is in disarray after it changed its default font
entries.description: US Government body swaps out the perennial Times New Roman for the sans serif Calibri, with predictable results.

entries.title: Amazon, Meta and Google are actually spending big on clean energy
entries.description: The least likely companies in some of the least likely states are going all in on clean energy, but their motives might not surprise you.

entries.title: The Linux Foundation wants to set up its own open source metaverse
entries.description: The Linux Foundation wants to tackle the metaverse head-on, before market dominance becomes a problem.

entries.title: The internet of the future could download Red Dead Redemption 2 in nanoseconds
entries.description: ‘10 million Gigabit internet’ is real, but definitely not coming to an ISP near you anytime soon

entries.title: Xbox Mini Fridge: everything you need to know and where to buy
entries.description: Microsoft’s Xbox Mini Fridge shouldn’t exist, but here we are. Find out how the meme-turned-reality product came to be and where you can buy it.

entries.title: Zoom virtual events are getting a serious makeover
entries.description: Zoom sessions are getting more features, for more users.

entries.title: Netflix wins the BAFTA 2023 nominations race – now it needs to land some awards

entries.title: Xbox Streaming Stick: release window and everything we know so far

entries.title: KFC Console: everything you need to know
entries.description: The KFC Console was revealed in December 2020 and promises to keep your fried chicken warm while gaming. Here’s everything you need to know about the KFConsole.

entries.title: Cloud-based cyberattacks have seen a huge rise
entries.description: Asia sees biggest rise in cloud-based attacks in 2022, but threats are rising across the globe.

entries.title: War Thunder players have leaked restricted military documents... again
entries.description: War Thunder players may have violated federal laws twice in one week, sharing F-15 and F-16 flight manuals.

entries.title: Windows 11 warning: system restore is breaking some PCs

entries.title: Instagram wants to manage your time on the app - but will it make a difference?

entries.title: I want to believe Warzone 2 Season 2 will be good thanks to the delay
entries.description: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 and Warzone 2 Season 2 delayed after player feedback, but update brings new content.

entries.title: Global IT spending could be set for a major boost in 2023
entries.description: After a small drop in IT spend in 2022, this year could see the figures bounce back.

entries.title: New free DLC reveals Tomb Raider's dirty little secret
entries.description: Return to Lara Croft’s mansion and wage war on grime in this free DLC for the PowerWash Simulator.

entries.title: Sophos lets hundreds of employees go in latest big tech job cuts

entries.title: Apple’s rumored smart display sounds like an iPad without the fun bits

entries.title: The Samsung Galaxy S23 series may be more affordable than we thought

entries.title: Apple TV Plus just revealed its 2023 lineup – and it's finally made me a believer

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4060 Ti could sip power – but will it be fast enough?
entries.description: So, fewer cores than the RTX 3060 Ti – still just 8GB of VRAM – and slower clocks, the rumor mill now suggests.

entries.title: This Microsoft Teams update will let you target your best friend (or worst enemy)
entries.description: Microsoft Teams tweak will allow users to send in-meeting notifications to exactly who they wish, for better or worse.

entries.title: Mailchimp suffers another major data breach following employee hack
entries.description: Mailchimp data accessed after a social engineering attack against its employees.

entries.title: Why does Apple think my M1 Pro MacBook Pro is suddenly worth nothing?
entries.description: While I'm waiting for an M3 Pro MacBook, Apple's trade-in prices are so terrible, they need a rethink.
